Construct an iterator.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/value_initialization|Value-initializes]] the underlying array of iterators {{rlpt|/#Data members|''current_''}} to {{rlpt|/#Member types|''Base''}}, as if by {{c|std::array&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt;, N&gt;()}}.

@2@ Conversion from {{c|/*iterator*/&lt;false&gt;}} to {{c|/*iterator*/&lt;true&gt;}}. Move constructs the underlying {{rlpt|/#Data members|''current_''}} member.

This iterator also has two private constructors which is used by {{lc|ranges::adjacent_view::begin}} and {{lc|ranges::adjacent_view::end}}. These constructors are not accessible to users.
